wikipedia_page.main: Charles Leslie Robson (born 1 November 1931) was an English footballer who scored 22 goals from 83 appearances in the Football League playing on the left wing for Hull City, Darlington and Crewe Alexandra. He was on the books of Liverpool, but never played for the first team, and also played non-league football for clubs including Goole Town.

response: In the FA Cup, a 3–1 win at Feethams took the Vale past league rivals Darlington in the First Round. Les Robson had put the "Quakers" ahead by half-time after Ray King miss-kicked a clearance, but the Vale controlled the game as soon as Albert Leake scored the equaliser.
